name: @hunmer/mira-monorepo
description: Mira TypeScript project - monorepo with core, server, and plugins

scripts.build:plugins: npm run build --workspace=packages/plugins/mira-demo && npm run build --workspace=packages/plugins/mira-user
scripts.clean: Remove-Item packages\*\dist -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item packages\*\node_modules -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item packages\plugins\*\dist -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item packages\plugins\*\node_modules -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue

author: hunmer
